caption.title: Overview of the effects of 100 mg/kg of P. minus essential oil against cisplatin-induced hepatotoxicity. At a dose of 100 mg/kg of P. minus essential oil able to ameliorate the effects of cisplatin-induced hepatotoxicity in rats by improving the antioxidant status and reducing the oxidative stress. In addition, it also restored the inflammatory response and apoptosis markers. As a consequence, 100 mg/kg of P. minus essential oil might be able to prevent liver injury in cisplatin-induced hepatotoxicity.
